content.body: I wonder if it makes sense to add a method to the C++ embedder API for `AsyncContext.Snapshot` to tell whether two objects represent the same underlying map
content.formatted_body: I wonder if it makes sense to add a method to the C++ embedder API for AsyncContext.Snapshot to tell whether two objects represent the same underlying map

content.body: also to create an `AsyncContext.Snapshot` with an empty map (well, with the map being `undefined` in my V8 implementation)
